
```{r}
#| echo: false
library(tidyverse)
tch_tib <- here::here("data/teaching.csv") |> readr::read_csv()
evals_tib <- here::here("data/evals.csv") |> readr::read_csv()
```

```{r}
freq_tbl_tch <- tch_tib |>
  dplyr::group_by(Course) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(
    frequency = n()
  )
freq_tbl_tch
```

```{r}
freq_tbl_evals <- evals_tib |>
  dplyr::group_by(Term) |> 
  dplyr::summarise(
    frequency = n()
  )
freq_tbl_evals
```

```{r}
datawizard::describe_distribution(x = tch_tib,
  select = NULL,

  iqr = TRUE,

  include_factors = FALSE,
  ci = NULL)
```
